bug.short_desc: Textfields added in a menu are not receiving keyboard events in some browsers

long_desc.thetext:
On the mailing list the qooxdoo user Seldaiendil posted the following Bug report;
http://www.mail-archive.com/qooxdoo-devel@lists.sourceforge.net/msg37723.html
"Finally I have a Playground example, here I add a context menu to root and you can see how the input inside the context menu does not throw keydown, keypress, keyup, keyinput events on Firefox and IE8 and IE9.
NOTE: on Google Chrome the events ARE fired"
Playground example:
http://tinyurl.com/3olkvq6

Putting a textfield into a menu is not a good idea at all. We had that ourself in the playground for a while and needed to hack all kinds of stuff together like fixing the menu keyboard navigation and so on.
